sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import './index.css'; const NewTransactionDetail = () => { const params = useParams() const [transaction, setTransaction] = useState([]); const [fee, setFee] = useState([]) const [nVin, setNvin] = useState(""); const [nVout, setNvout] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { Promise.all([ fetch("http://localhost:6600/getTransaction/" + params.txId), fetch("http://localhost:6600/getFee/" + params.txId), ]) .then(([reTransaction, reFee]) => Promise.all([reTransaction.json(), reFee.json()]) ) .then(([dataTransaction, dataFee]) => { setTransaction(dataTransaction); setFee(dataFee) setNvin(dataTransaction.vin.length); setNvout(dataTransaction.vout.length); }); }, []) return(

Transaction: {transaction.txid}

Transakcija {transaction.txid}
Naknada {fee}
Verzija {transaction.version}
Hash {transaction.hash}
Velicina {transaction.size} B
Virtualna velicina {transaction.vsize} vB
Težina {transaction.weight}
Broj izlaza {nVout}
Izlazne transakcije {transaction.vout.map(trans =>

{trans}

)}
Broj ulaza {nVin}
Ulazne transakcije {transaction.vin.map(trans =>

{trans}

)}
) } export default NewTransactionDetail;
